titleInfo.title: Hierarchical Codebook Visually Evoked Potentials for fast and flexible BCIs -- Dataset

mods.abstract: This is the complete EEG dataset which was recorded for the linked study. A small README tells a bit about the data structure and the publication explains what data was recorded. For any further questions contact the author.
